tidbits.title: Channel Island Charm
tidbits.description: Guernsey is one of the Channel Islands, known for its charming landscapes, beautiful cliffs, sandy beaches, and rich historical sites.

tidbits.title: Intriguing History
tidbits.description: The island has an intriguing history, from Neolithic sites to German occupation during World War II, reflected in its museums and fortifications.

tidbits.title: Unique Legal System
tidbits.description: Guernsey operates under its unique legal system, known as Norman customary law, blending British influence with traditional island customs.
